ComicInfo.Title: Tempest Fugit Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary: Tempest Fugit Conclusion: The truth behind Monster Island is revealed.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:24:36. [CVDB112745] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:54:15. [Issue ID 240829]
ComicInfo.Editor: Andy Schmidt,Joe Quesada,Nicole Wiley Boose,Stephanie Moore,Tom Brevoort
ComicInfo.Characters: Betty Banner,Professor Yarish,Hulk [Bruce Banner],Doc Samson [Leonard Samson],Nightmare [also disguised as Mephisto] (villain),Miss Banner [Mrs. Drake] (flashback,Gwen (Nightmare's daughter),General Thunderbolt Ross [Thaddeus Ross],Ripley,Bruce's aunt)
